edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.management

Interface Manager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceManager

    public interface Manager
    Operations that must be supported to manage a service facility that has a list of "tiered" items awaiting service and service droids that perform repairs on devices.
    Author:
    Jo Perry, David Wright

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewDroid()
      Adds a new service droid to the service center.
      void assignDroids()
      Fills the service bays with items awaiting service.
      java.lang.String printDroids()
      A string representation of the list of bays in the service area.
      java.lang.String printWaitList(java.lang.String filter)
      A string representation of the list of items awaiting service that meet the given filter.
      void putOnWaitingList(Prioritizable v)
      Puts an item in the list of those awaiting service.
      void putOnWaitingList(java.lang.String k, java.lang.String b, java.lang.String c, int x)
      Puts an item in the service wait list.
      Prioritizable releaseFromService(int droid)
      Releases the item from the given service bay.
      Prioritizable remove(java.lang.String filter, int position)
      Removes an item meeting the given filter from the list of items awaiting service.

    • Method Detail

      • putOnWaitingList

        void putOnWaitingList(java.lang.String k,
                      java.lang.String b,
                      java.lang.String c,
                      int x)
        Puts an item in the service wait list.
        Parameters:
        k - Kind of item
        b - Item data (such as serial number)
        c - Item data (such as owner name)
        x - Item tier

      • putOnWaitingList

        void putOnWaitingList(Prioritizable v)
        Puts an item in the list of those awaiting service.
        Parameters:
        v - The item to put on waiting list

      • remove

        Prioritizable remove(java.lang.String filter,
                     int position)
        Removes an item meeting the given filter from the list of items awaiting service.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filters the list of items considered for removal
        position - Position in the filtered list of the item to be removed
        Returns:
        The item that was removed, or null if nothing was removed

      • assignDroids

        void assignDroids()
        Fills the service bays with items awaiting service.

      • releaseFromService

        Prioritizable releaseFromService(int droid)
        Releases the item from the given service bay.
        Parameters:
        droid - index of the droid where the item is being serviced
        Returns:
        Item that was released from service, or null if the droid was empty

      • addNewDroid

        void addNewDroid()
        Adds a new service droid to the service center.

      • printWaitList

        java.lang.String printWaitList(java.lang.String filter)
        A string representation of the list of items awaiting service that meet the given filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - Determines which items are are of interest
        Returns:
        String String representation of the filtered list

      • printDroids

        java.lang.String printDroids()
        A string representation of the list of bays in the service area.
        Returns:
        String representation of the service area
